response.original_title: The Dirty Third 2 Home Sweet Home
response.overview: The award winning independent film #DirtyThird that swept through the urban, suburban, & country streets of America, has gained a cult like following is now back with the highly anticipated sequel. Dirty 3rd 2 #HomeSweetHome welcomes the character Street back to the grit, grime, and limelight of the hood life in the social streets. On his new quest for more positive life, he has a head on collision with all the negative forces that exist in the hood. This must see movie takes you on a ride that reveals the real by capturing the serious, but often hilarious, day by day challenges met by the urban users of today. This exhilarating journey through the dirty dirty stares the entire #WreckshopRecords Family and a host of multi-platinum selling rep stars such as #Scarface #E40 #BigMoe #LilTroy #BigPokey #BunB and comedians #ReynaldoRey #RodneyWinfield #Ali
response.title: The Dirty Third 2 Home Sweet Home
